title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 6 categories on the x axis representing Diseases, and Number of deaths per day in each Diseases on the y axis.
The highest category is found at HIV/AIDS where Number of deaths per day is 685.0.
The lowest category is found at Ebola where Number of deaths per day is 4.0.
The highest value at HIV/AIDS is almost 171.25 times larger than the minimum value of Ebola.

The difference between the max Diseases HIV/AIDS and min Diseases Ebola is 681.0.
